DOC.brief_title: Clinical Research 18F-Alfatide Ⅱ PET/CT Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator aim assess clinical application 18F-Alfatide Ⅱ PET/CT diagnosis treatment response monitoring breast cancer .
DOC.criteria: The patient suspect diagnosed breast cancer receive treatment ; It must fulfill ethical requirement subject sign informed consent . Pregnancy nurse mother ; Those patient accompany serious disease cardiac functional insufficiency , hepatic renal function insufficiency .
